name: Allow for FDM_Server_Specification) Server
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(ATTCON_04_close,ATTCON_04_open,FDM_Additional Hard Disk (Server),FDM_Additional Memory (Server Disk),FDM_Display Size (Server),FDM_Display Supplier (Server),FDM_Displays (Server) (0-1),FDM_Node Supplier (Server),FDM_Server Node Type,FDM_Trusted Platform Module (TPM),Header_03_close,Header_03_open)*>
<*SETREQUIRED(FDM_Additional Hard Disk (Server),FDM_Additional Memory (Server Disk),FDM_Display Size (Server),FDM_Display Supplier (Server),FDM_Displays (Server) (0-1),FDM_Node Supplier (Server),FDM_Server Node Type,FDM_Trusted Platform Module (TPM))*>
